definitions.title: n.pr. 1. m. a.
definitions.body: a king of Midian Nu 31:8 (RoKom), Jos 13:21 (Robok, A Rokom, LXX OroKom).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: a ‘son’ of Hebron 1Ch 2:43; 1Ch 2:44, Rekom, Rokom, Rwkhm.

definitions.title: 2. loc.
definitions.body: in Benj., Jos 18:27, Nakan, A LXXL Rekem[n].
